title: Prey for the Children
description: Enjoy these latest tales from Horror/Sci-fi writer, R.M. Duchene. These eleven dark tales range from sci-fi to horror and everything in between. In this latest collection, R.M. Duchene writes about a sadistic game of Marco-Polo, a father who must make the ultimate choice when his daughted is abducted, a man who decides to take the law into his own hands when his girlfriend is killed by a serial killer, and much more. So, open the door to the world of R.M. Duchene and let a little darkness into your life.
author: R.M. DuChene
